twitch_info.title: Crimson Needle 2.5 | #6 - Reaching the Peak (Blind Playthrough)

message.body: Heya Wolfi, good luck with today's floors!
are you a top or a bottomâ€¦.player in mario kart?
an interesting save for sure, I wonder if there's a bulletblocker in the first room
good! been playing a lot of xiv
we only had one sesh but we made good headway in black cat
I'm MT do you have any tips for reading the double nine lives section
are you a honey B enjoyer or a hater
i made a special glam for her
i made ones for m1 and m2
alright i'm just gonna say it
that was a depressing time to join
id rather join a depressing moment then when wolfi isnt streaming
has the new expansion made it better?
dawntrail the latest exp came out like a month ago
the story is more hit-and-miss for people
i enjoyed one area and thats it lol... but the dungeons and raids are 10/10
yeah pacing was lil rough in the second half
but I thought the first half was perfect
im so far behind now, my char is like half way through shadowbringers LUL
I thought it was slow and deliberate but it told a really amazing story for me
yeah, but the way the themes in both halves tie into each other and really come to a head at the end was just, like, *gosh*
I could write a thesis on that game
yea my wife enjoyed the first half too, im also more the other way around
i still need to continue ff7rebirth
I think almost all of my friends preferred the first half
I assumed that was universal but probably my friends are not a representative sample of the playerbase haha
pandaemonium is dope but yeah this raid arc is so hype
I love them both so far but I'll wait and see for the last two tiers
there's like always filler raids, especially in the first tier, but every character in this raid tier got a proper character yknow? they're all memorable
prowres is such a good theme for a raid series
i love the commentator commentating when someone is fallen out of the ring lol
developing communist theory call that question marx
just do the buffed plane next to it Kappa
Bamboozled by the wizard kid once again
make a note of it anyways..
the mini today is fkn me up..
i do it every morning while drinking my tea, its like my favourite thing to do in the whole day
yeah saturday minis are always larger
nah sometimes the clues are stil easy
todays is just especially tough, at least for me
although some days they fuck me up
i spam check through every letter as a self hint
like check A for every box
I have abandoned connections... some things about how they're often designed made it not too fun for me
I do like mini, I should do them more often
i pref the mini but the connections is occasionally more fun (when i win)
Have you done Squaredle? I think that's still my favourite.
So odd question, what's your favorite uncommon fruit/berry?
Say for instance dragon fruit or figs
highly recommend both, they're surprisingly underrated. Sainsburys or M&S has figs in stock atm
Oh yeah had the juice version of that, one of my favorites as well
the green one is decent too
the blue color unequivocally enhances the flavor
why no spoilers, there is something else to do other than climbing the floors? secrets?
I played CN1 and it was just basic climbing (or I missed them all idk LUL )
so you found your first secret without even knowing the game had them right
derf made a guide with incremental hints if you ever want that
I would save first if I were you
plateforming seems fun, but I have only seen 90 and 91 so far
oof, well worst case i'll not finish it and enjoy the floors i complete
even without secrets it's probably challenging enough for my skill level
i have the esaids manflu that zwanzig had last week so im kinda crappy, what about you
good to meet the few people that still went but kinda weird atmosphere over all id say
oh yeah they like super suck right
I remember I stopped going because it seemed like they kinda sucked
I meaaan, Britain isn't that bad
i honestly doubt much is gonna happen as long as planks and edenal are in charge tbh
itll just be: we back - nothing was changed except production value went down because theyre on the brink of bankrupcy
i thought edenal was gonna step down
wait I'm out of the loop, what's the drama about?
what does bsg actually stand for?

there were a bunch of incidents of sexual misconduct that was extremly poorly handled (aka not at all) and a bunch of other behind the scenes stuff that just completly went wrong including basically getting rid of all teamleaders and full teams such as scheduling
benelux speed gaming yea, its near the dutch/german border
bsg is always like 1 week after ESA I think
UKSG would be the britain one
BSG is like.... next weekend i think
well technically its near belgium/germany/in the netherlands
to us BSG is just cheaper and a lot of ppl said they would not come to esa anymore so....
no real reason to keep going if most ppl dont come anymore
the venue at BSG is similar
I mean I only went to Max once this year, and that was largely motivated by getting the picture for you. 4Head
momentum with events is a big part of it for sure
are they going to resign with the hotel in malmÃ¶? I think it was the last edition with their current deal
hard to say if they sign with the hotel again given how much it costs and how low on money they are now having lost all sponsorships pretty much
I asked for more pillows too LUL
And hey, if we're in the Netherlands, I can get good old Dutch snackbar food.
speaking of i am kinda hungry....
to know where i'm going next year, i'll just check where the boardgame people are going, if it's bsg then so be it
we played a lot of codenames this year LUL
Speaking of board games, ESA got me addicted to Wingspan.
its a very...... accurate bird game
I think it was there last year, but I didn't play it then.
it's been there for a couple years
I got it on Steam. It's quite fun.
lots of cards, and lying, only 10% of games left
Oh yeah I remember that game.
It definitely was to get rid of your cards yeah.
isnt it the cyanide and happiness cardgame?
i'll never forget kurath's ultimate gambit of claiming he's the assassin, shooting himself, calling himself out on it and instantly losing everything
you have seen the floors after this one?
have you tried mouse cursor on warp and pressing tab
ooh, no wonder it looked totally new to me, I stopped around 80 I think for CN2 LUL
the number itself was traumatizing enough
screw any boss just gimme needles
there was the bosses in the goblin stage that you did
do my eyes deceive me or is there only a handful of gates in this floor...
you have to do floor 9 and floor 3 in a row
I'm preparing for the couch potato life since I will be having shoulder surgery soon. Likely no gaming for the next month FeelsBadMan
It's adjusting my bicep so they mentioned they do not want me to agitate it
On the bright side, this might be amq practice arc
Gotta get good at left hand only
Or get tts to do it LUL
i should probably look into shoulder surgery as well but going to the doctor's is such a pain
Yeah Cosmo...this took me 2 years before they took it serious
I told them I must be able to rock climb
maybe if i start taking baseball more seriously I'll bother then
3 months anuj and then it is time to get to it
You guys looked cool though. I'm glad I got to take pics
i remember trying to convince you for many horus
there's still one dandy game i have yet to beat..
things went off the rails with strawberry dandy
i was abotu to say the exact same thign wolfi
And now we understandal the vandal
vandal was brutal but such a good game
it's on my list of games i kept on my new computer LUL
i have a massive one on my old computer, and a selection i can boot on any computer if needed
ye we going for first time in likeâ€¦ 10 years
I think that sounds about right
not sure if want to be zoomer
But also has anyone done this all secrets yet
pluto finished the game but is now replaying it to look for things that have been missed. didnt stream yesterday to take a rest lol
@kombucha_ extremely good. best run ive had in an event
I feel like zurai's power has surely diminished with time
@wolsk I found out about the sm64 romhack marathon last night. Didn't know it was a thing.
Is this a punishment room or an actual secret
oh, does this game has many secrets?
you can but it's very inconvenient
right click and set the row size
Is this cycle based or jump based
It looks like jump but I can't tell
say that it is not the way that it is
Is that red boshy as a character choice
you are going crazy. there actually wasnt an ESA 2023
it's a rat kinda day I feel
you need to do floor 100 backwards with the rat
personally im a solid kid fan. hits harder than glow kid for me
perhaps that is what youre missing
you may have realized this sooner had you trusted that it was a rat day
rat would have made that jump I feel
yeah I played it off stream a couple days ago and did like 20 floors or something
well that was why I didnt play this game further on stream lol. I was playing horribly
or pro-mmorpg PSA, depending on how you look at it
maybe it's cope but I feel like there are extremely minor engine differences that are throwing me off
the nikaple water in the original cn2 was truly beautiful
I was thinking a CN3 nikaple port couldve been good
might as well just port cn2.5 to nikaple then
@cosmoing what is special about nikaple water
i actually have no fucking idea but i can probably turn it into a x pilled y maxxer meme for you
I think I may be fine without the aforementioned idea
minor engine differences is so far away from my ballpark it's basically an alien
it actually goes from 93 to 100 directly
yeah I was wondering if your spreadsheet was set up for that LOL
surely it is only 1 floor where this is a concern and that you will not have to deal with your past spreadsheet decisions again
Never overthink, the simple solutions will work for now
it's attacking me from the inside
this is truly not what you like to hear
i've never heard you so excited
